TEXT.Text: We're getting less tax income by each day.. I've heard harvest is suffering as well. This could be a problem..
Chaos has engulfed the stars of the Zodiac world, because of the disappearance of Pios. Please help us.
Please help us.
I pray for Pios is well.
Why did you leave me Pios? Was my curse that unbearable?
Oh no! because the decrease in tax collected, there could be a problem in kingdom’s financial situation. I reported it to our sovereign.
Why are the prices of ingredients so high? I heard it’s because of the sudden weather changes..
The crops in the farms are dying and qualities of minerals are also in terrible shape.
Seems like the stars along the constellations are shifting. This is a bad sign..
Stars are shifting.. It's a bad news for us down here..
Weather is acting weird. I fear the worst for our crops..
Defeat all monsters
Aries Boss Room
Defeat Typoon
Protect Flix

[Story of Aries] Flix has gone to Aries to get Golden Sheep. Water spirit Undine has kidnapped his sister Helleta and Flix must bring a Golden Fleece for his sister's return. Flix obtained the Golden Sheep, but has been stopped by Typhoon the Pirate, who is also after the Golden Sheep.
If you save Flix from Typhoon, you can obtain a Golden Fleece, which is the key to enter the Taurus Dungeon.
[Aries Myth] Legend has it that when King Athamus of Boetia took a second wife, Ino, she was extremely jealous and resentful of his existing children, especially his son, Phrixus. She therefore deviously plotted the failure of the corn crop, intercepted and bribed the messenger sent by her husband to consult an oracle on the matter, and instructed him to say that he had been told that Phrixus had to be sacrificed if the people were to escape starvation. Despite pleadings from the boy's mother, Nephele, King Athamus agreed to the sacrifice but, at the very last minute, the boy and his sister, Helle, were saved by a magnificent ram with a golden fleece, sent by Zeus in answer to their mother's prayers. Unfortunately, as the ram crossed the narrow stretch of water between Europe and Asia, Helle fell to her death (the straits are still known as Hellespont)
Phlixus arrived at Colchis, he sacrificed the sheep to Zeus and gave the Golden Fleece to king of Colchis
Zeus promoted the Sheep to the stars as the Aries constellation .
Ugh! Help me. Typhoon the Pirate is stealing my Golden Sheep from me.
Hey you little thief! Hurry and give back my Golden Sheep!! Or I'll send you to the afterlife before you see your sister again!
But without Golden Sheep I cannot get my sister back.%% My sister fall to the sea and Water Spirit Undine, but in return she ask for the Golden Fleece.%%
Typhoon's not the owner of the sheep and I caught the sheep on my own. I did not steal it. %% Please help me. I am Flix, and I always repay my debts. !!
Thank you. Now I am safe, and I can keep Golden Sheep also.%% Now I can get my sister back. I miss her so much.
We were sent here to find Pios from Crete. Pios's disappearance is putting our world in danger. This is why we need the Golden Fleece.
What! Really?? I need to take Golden Fleece to Undine, what should I do?? ..
Hey.. Wait This small patch at the stomach, Undine won't notice. I will share some of the Fleece with you.
Please find Pios and save Galaxy from this chaos. Since his disappearance, this world has been overrun by monsters.
Hey, I know you! You've helped me before.
You helped my again. Haha.. Thanks to you, I was able get my sister back.
I have to take care of my sister at any cost.
The Golden Fleece can be sold at a very high price. So I keep coming back here to earn some money, even though it is very dangerous.
Taurus Boss Room
Defeat the Bull Minotauros

[Story of Taurus] Crete says Key of Moonlight can be obtained from Europa on the Taurus constellation. But because of the persistant meddling from Hades, she won't be easy to approach. Europa upon seeing the Fellowship, ran away thinking they were Hades's men. This has left her guardian Minotauros to attack the Fellowship.
To get the Key of Moonlight, you need help from Europa. Survive Minotauros and persuade Europa.
[Taurus Myth] Zeus had fallen in love with the beautiful Europa, daughter of King Agenor, as she strolled with her companions on the seashore. He suddenly appeared amongst them as a magnificent white bull, but one which was so gentle that they felt no fear. Europa and her maidens gathered flowers and made garlands which they hung around the animal's neck and, such was their trust in his docility, that Europa climbed upon his back. However, at this moment, the bull plunged into the sea and swam away furiously with the terrified girl. When they reached Crete, Zeus revealed his true identity and ravished her. Currently it is known that name "Europe" was based from this myth.
Gemini Boss Room
Recovery Pollux
Recovery Castor

[Story of Gemini] To get the Key of Star, Fellowship need to visit Cancer, but it is among the Dark Stars, making it hard to find the way. The only ones that can help the Fellowship are the twins, Pollux and Castor, so visit Gemini first. However due to the recent chaos, Castor has become mentally unstable, causing her twin sister Pollux to suffer the effects as well.
Fellowship cannot reach Cancer without their help, so you need to help them recover.
[Gemini Myth] Castor and Pollux (or Polydeuces) were called the Dioscuri, or Sons of Zeus, because Zeus, in the form of a swan, fathered them by Leda. They were closely identified with the city of Sparta, Castor as a renowned horseman and Pollux as a boxer. They sailed with the Argonauts, participated in the Calydonian boar hunt and later helped to rescue their sister Helen of Troy, who had been kidnapped by Thesus and Pirithous.
Finally, in a fight with Idas and Lynceus, whose intended brides Castor and Pollux had kidnapped, Pollux killed Lynceus, but Idas killed Castor and was in turn killed by a thunderbolt of Zeus. Pollux, being immortal, was allowed to share his immortality with Castor, in the heavens as the constellation Gemini.
Big sister!! I think I am losing my mind.%% Since Pios' disappearance, something is taking hold of me. Please help me to stop this….

Oh. I.. I am sorry.%% We are not trying to hurt you. We are Fellowship from the world Dragon Saga.%% Crete asked us to find the Zodiac Master Pios, so we are here. To get to the 4th constellation "Cancer", I am only here to ask for help.
Really? You are also looking for Pios....

Then I can help you to reach Cancer.%% Cancer is among the Dark Stars, so it will be difficult to find the way. It will be best if I lead you to it, but I have to look after my little sister.%% Here is my compass, you will able to find it using this.%% Please find Pios, then my sister will be ok. Please help us.
Cancer Boss Room
Defeat Crab monster Keyrab
Make Hercules survive

[Story of Cancer] Fellowship has reached Cancer by using the compass from Gemini. At Cancer, They run into Hercules, who was there looking for ingredients for Boiled Crab. The fellowship inform Hercules that there is something that is causing the chaos among the zodiac stars. Suddenly, Crab Monster Keyrab appears and starts attacking.
To get to Ophiuchus, Key of Flame Star is required. Defeat Keyrab with Hercules to obtain Key of Flame Star.
[Cancer Myth] The story begins with Zeus having an affair with Alcmene, the queen of Tiryns. The result of this union was the Heracles (the Romans named him our familiar Hercules), the most famous Greek Hero. Of course, this union and offspring did not go over too well with Hera, the wife of Zeus. Hera, in her jealous state, swore to kill Hercules. Hera attempted to have Hercules killed many times but his imposing strength allowed him to overcome. Cancer comes into this ‘beloved’ scene when Hercules is fighting the terrible water-serpent, Hydra. During the battle between Heracles and Hydra, Hera sent Cancer, the giant crab, to aid the serpent. As the violent fight took place, Cancer was nipping at Hercules feet. But Heracles, being so mighty in strength, killed the crab by smashing its shell with his foot. Hera then placed the crab's image in the night sky as a reward for it’s service.
Leo Boss Room
Defeat Giant Lion Kaion
Hercules must survive
Obtain Unicorn's horn

[Story of Leo] To enter Ophiuchus, a Key of Blue Star is required, to obtain the key, you need to meet Persephone at Virgo. However to protect Persephone, her mother, Demeter placed a strong seal. To break and enter the seal, you require an Unicorn's horn. Unicorn's horn is known as a Symbol of pureness and it is being protected by Giant Lion Kaion.
If you defeat Kaion, you will able to obtain Unicorn's horn. Hercules is also at Leo to obtain the Lion skin. Work together to defeat Kaion.
[Leo Myth] The story is about the Nemean lion which Hercules had to kill as the first of his 12 Labours. This fearsome beast terrorised the land, killing all who ventured near it. Not only was it more fierce, larger and stronger than other lions, but it also had the added advantage of possessing a skin which was impervious to metal, stone and wood. Since, for this reason, Hercules could not kill the lion with any weapon, he wrestled it with his bare hands, and finally managed to strangle the animal. Seeing at once the unique protective qualities of the pelt, he removed it with one of the lion's own claws, and thereafter wore it as a cloak.
Who are you?%% Please help me.
I am a Hercules, hero of the zodiac gods, but I find it difficult to face the lion alone.%% If you help me, I will add you in my autobiography.
( I hope there won't be any stories of me taken down by the lion.. )
There are so many people who wish to get his fur. Are you after the Unicorn's Horn?
( This would be a great chapter for my biography! The great hero Hercules helps another hero from another world by facing Kaion!! )

We are Fellowship from the world of Dragon Saga, we are looking to find Pios by opposing Ophiuchus.%% We are here for the Unicorn's Horn that the lion is protecting.%% You are the hero Hercules from the myths? ( He doesn't seem that strong.. )
Hahaha!! So you know who I am. I just need the fur of the lion. You can have the Unicorn's Horn. ( My fame is everywhere.... )
You need an Unicorn's Horn? Are you going to Virgo?
You'll find Hades's henchmen over there, you need to be careful.%% Be safe.. If we meet again, I will help you.
Giant Lion skin is very popular.
There are so many people asking for it, it's so bothersome.%% I am hero! I cannot decline such requests…
Virgo Boss Room
Rescue Persephone

[Story of Virgo] To obtain Key of Blue Star, the fellowship went to look for Persephone. However Virgo was overran by monsters from hell. Monsters are here to kidnap Persephone under the orders from Hades, the god of hell. Persephone was well known for her beauty so he is trying kidnap her.
If Persephone is saved from Hades, she will able to give you the Key of Blue Star.
[Virgo Myth] Persephone, daughter of Zeus and Demeter, had been abducted and taken to the underworld by Hades. In revenge her mother ruined the harvests, the earth became infertile and the people were starving. Zeus was forced to issue a decree stating that Persephone should spend only a short time each year in the underworld, and when she was released Demeter permitted Nature to resume its natural course.
Pegasus Boss Room
Protect Pegasus

[Story of Pegasus] Key of Green Star can only be obtained at Scorpio. However the Scorpio is filled with poison, to enter Scorpio, a flying horse, Pegasus is needed. At Pegasus, it's found that monsters have already attacked and injured Pegasus, and Perseus is trying to protect the horse. Monsters are the henchman of Hades, and Hades is trying to steal Pegasus.
Protect Pegasus from the monsters with Perseus to enter Scorpio.
[Pegasus Myth] The white, winged horse Pegasus was the offspring of Poseidon and the Gorgon , Medusa, springing from the latter's neck when she was killed by Perseus. He immediately flew to Mount Helicon and struck the ground with his hoof. The resulting stream which flowed from the spot he had pawed became sacred to the Muses. Some time later Pegasus was to help Perseus to rescue Andromeda from the dreadful sea monster Cetus.
Bellerophon, the grandson of Sisyphus (a selfish man punished by the Gods for his arrogance by being forced to continually push an enormous boulder to the top of a hill, only for it to roll back down just as the goal seemed within reach) was also greatly aided by Pegasus when undertaking several dangerous missions, including his fight against the Chimaera, the three-headed monstrous female. However, the success of this and other missions turned Bellerophon's head and he, too, became arrogant. So much so, that although a mere mortal, he forced Pegasus to fly him to Mount Olympus, the home of the Gods. Zeus , greatly annoyed at Bellerophon's presumption that he was worthy to be in such august company, sent an insect to bite Pegasus on his flank, causing him to rear up and throw Bellerophon to the ground. He was then dispatched back to earth, and ended his days a sad and lonely figure, blind and lame. For Pegasus, however, there was the reward of a place in the stables on Mount Olympus, and the opportunity to carry around Zeus's thunderbolts
No!! Pegasus..%% I need you help to cure my wife who has been poisoned.
Ah! Ok. I will help you stop the monsters.%% Pegasus has a very strong regeneration, so if we can buy him some time, he will be ok again.
Oh!! We did it. Thanks for your help, I can go to Scorpio.%%
My lovely wife Andromeda has been poisoned.%% 'Cure a poison with a poison.' To cure her, I need strong poison like the one owned by monster Scorpion.%%
With this Pegasus feather, I can get to the Scorpio easily.
Hmm, we are also heading for the Scorpio. We need the feather of Pegasus also.
Oh, ok. There are plenty of feathers for everyone.%%
If we meet again at the Scorpio, I will help you. I will see you there. Thanks again.
Oh, it is you. Nice to see you again. I managed to get the poison of Scorpion and save my wife.%%
But I love my wife. So I can eat the food although the it doesn't taste that good.%% But for future usage, I would like to collect them.
I think I have to do this for rest of my life. ( SIGH. )
Scorpio Boss Room
Defeat Monster Scorpion Kingspion
Protect Pegasus
Obtain Scorpio Sting

[Story of Scorpio] If monster scorpion Kingspion is defeated, you will able to get Key of Green Star. Pegasus also need Scorpio Sting to treat her poisoned wife, work with him to defeat the Kingspion. There are many poisonous insects on the way to Kingspion, so be careful. Especially Kingspion's sting is very strong, so avoid it at all cost.
Beware of the sting and defeat Kingspion and obtain Key of Green Star.
[Scorio Myth] God of ocean Poseidon and Princess of Crete Euryale had a son called Orion. Orion was very big and strong giant. He could move fast and was very strong, and he could hunt every wild animals. Orion became very proud of himself and boast that nothing is this world can beat him. Hera heard this and sent small scorpion. Giant Orion could not see small scorpion and get killed with one strike from scorpion. Orion became a start sign with the scorpion in the night sky by Hera.
Sagittarius Boss Room
Recover Keyron

[Story of Sagittarius] To get the Key of Golden Star, the last required key, you will require aid from a wise centaurus. When the fellowship arrive on the Sagittarius where the centaurus is, they are faced with Keyron who has lost his mind. Centaurus is half human, half horse and they are well known for humanly calmness and wildness of an animal. The chaos bring down even wise Keyron to a wild beast.
Once Keyron is back to himself, he will able to help the fellowship. Recover him from the chaos.
[Sagittarius Myth] Half human, half horse centaurus has both human and beast personality. Most of them has very wild personality but Keyron has very bright mind, even to compete with some god and he had very peaceful personality. He was master in medical, art and hunting. So many heroes including Hercules were his student.
One day Hercules visit centaurus. He was so thirsty that he convinced his friend Polos and drank wine that is owned by the tribe with out any consultant. The tribe got very angry and try to attack him while he is still drunk, but they could not beat Hercules. Hercules start using an arrows with Hydra blood. During the brawl Keyron came to stop and one Hercules's arrow hit him. However since Keyron can not die, he was just in constant pain. Zeus found out and pass on the eternal life to Prometheus and allow Keyron to die. Zeus took the dead body of Keyron and make a star sign.
Oh !! Wh..What happened?? I can not remember anything.. %% Who are you?? Did I do something to you?

Keyron, are you ok? You were acting very strangely. I think it was caused by the chaos that is happening allover the galaxy.%% We are looking for Pios to fix or remove the chaos. We need to wake Sea serpent Hydra and to do so we need your help. Can you help us?

Yes. Now I remember When Pios disappeared, whole galaxy was covered in a chaos. Since then many sick people appeared.%% I am not good as Pios, but I am not too bad in medical, so I was fix the sick people. But I do not know what is causing this illness.%% I think we need to find Pios.
To wake up the sea serpent, you will need this harp. I enjoy music also, so I have many instrument.
But Hydra is very violent, so I make it to fall asleep, wake it up might make the situation worse. Please make sure the hydra to go back to sleep again, and please find Pios.
Oh dear, I lost my mind again. I am shamed of my position, which is the wise centaurus.
Hydra Boss Room
Defeat sea serpent Hydra

[Story of Hydra] To get the Key of Golden Star, you need to wake up the sea serpent and defeat him. The serpent was too strong so it was sent to sleep, so waking up the serpent might result in very dangerous situation. Wake up Hydra using the harp of goddess, defeat hydra and retrieve the key and send it back to sleep. That is only way to protect Galaxy according to Crete.
However sea serpent has three head, and it's head will keep spawn again. However its middle head has its weakness. So use the weakness and get the key.
[Hydra Myth] Hercules was born between Zeus and a human. Zeus's wife Hera hated Hercules and ordered King Eurystheus to make Hercules to perform 12 difficult tasks. One of them was to defeat Immortal Hydra. Hercules went to battle with his cousin Iolaus. Hercules found out that every time he cut off a Hydra's head, it keep growing back, so it was impossible to kill it. Iolaus used a torch to burn out the position where Hercules has cut off, as result the head stop growing back and the Hercules able to defeat Hydra. Hercules dig up a hole and put the last Hydra's head and placed a large rock over it.
In honor of the victory, Zeus took the Hydra's head and make a star sign.
Ophiuchus Boss Room
Recover Pios who are in chaos
Defeat evil serpents
Complete recover of Pios

[Story of Ophiuchus] By putting 5 keys together, it will becomes a Constellation ring, and you may enter Ophiuchus. Crete ask you to come with her to Ophiuchus. When the fellowship enter Ophiuchus, Pios was there but he was also not normal. Luckily, he recognize Crete and seems to remember, but once he heard whispering from the snake that is around him, he want into chaos and start attacking the Fellowship.
Pios needs to be back to normal or whole galaxy will be in great trouble, and it will result bad effect in world of Dragon Saga. You must find the reason for Pios's change and cure Pios and save the world from danger.
[Ophiuchus Myth] Between god of sun Apollo and princess Coronis, there was a son called Aescupalius. He was very bright and sent to Keyron of centaurus to study about medical, plantation and herb. He was first doctor. He once saw a snake reviving a dead snake with a special herb. He use the herb to cure people and keep them alive. However the god of hell Hades speak to Zeus about this, saying that the world will be overpopulated and hell will be empty. Zeus ordered Aescupalius not to revive people, but he disobey as result he was struck down by Zeus. Although he disobey Zeus, he heart was for good, so he bring him up to sky and make him a star sign.
Kingdom’s financial crisis
This would be problem.. because of tax income is getting less, Kingdom’s financial situation is getting worse.
This would be a big problem.. besides of kingdom’s financial, people would have difficult for their life..
Jeremy told me we can’t do anything because harvest amount is become less and less. So I want you to check how serious it is.
No one cares their country! Just remember, there are no people without kingdom.
Any news? I guess not.. please hurry.
I can’t buy any ingredients for my food! Revenue is getting less because of high price for ingredients.
To make weapons, high quality iron is needed, but recently I couldn't see that kind of quality.That's why revenue has been decreased and tax amount to pay is getting less.

I heard plant from the Farm is not growing fast as much as before. Iron quality is also getting worse. According to miners, Great Wizard Gwen used to cast a horoscopes and predict the time to harvest, but it doesn’t seems to predictable thesedays.

Farmers, Fishers, and Miners. All of them come to see me to ask questions before they start their work, to know when is the best time to harvest..%% Horoscope tells us when is the best time, and it had been always correct. However, recent prediction is not correct and people's harvest amount is getting less and less.%% I believe Sage Jeremy could know the reason of this sudden change.. You should talk to the Sage.

Horoscope is becoming not reliable thesedays.. Hmm. I guess recent change in Star sing could be a reason of it.%% Once there's change in Star Sign, it affects to all living thing. And people cannot avoid the change, either. If the change is not stopped, I cannot say what would happen next.
Talk to Best cook <Brutus>
Talk to Blacksmith <Davi>
Talk to Production Maestro <Midas>
Talk to Great Wizard <Gwen>
Talk to Sage <Jeremy>
Hit of Meteo
There's a fallen stone.. Please investigat the place, carefully.

There's rumor that there's {C=0xFF7D0000/}meteo fallen{C=0xFF4D0D08/} somewhere in the Port of Winds. You need to investigate the area .%% Since we have no information for exact place of it, please check the area carefully. If you find the place, please check if there's any possible threat for village.%% I will count on you. Make sure that there's any threat.
How could you not doing this, even when you're one of fellowship?
I assume the place meteo fell into is center of Port of Winds, somewhere Myhome located in. I heard there's gateway of dimension.
Investigate the place meteo fell into
Investigate the place more deeply
Crete, Pios' lover
Please help me.
My fiancé, Pios is in Ophiuchus. I'll let you know how to get there.

My fiancé, {C=0xFF00863C/}Pios he owner of 10 constellations{C=0xFF4D0D08/} is disappeared. Due to his disappearance, it's been real chaos in Star Sign world and many of stars is affecting bad influences to others.%% Pios used to specialized in medicine and owner of Star Sign. He always tried hard to study new medicine. Using his skills, he could saves a lot of people's lives in Star Sign and people respect him.%% But one day, the snake called Serpent showed up, and told him to teach mysterious medicine. Pios has no reason to reject this suggestion. After he learn new medicine, he could cure more disease that he ever imagine.%% However, Pios started to change. He doesn't talk to people, and gets upset more often. And then he's gone without a word.
You're doing terrible thing. {C=0xFF00863C/}%name%{C=0xFF4D0D08/} just ruined destiny of Dragon Saga and Star Sign.
Talk to Crete
Ring of Star Sign
If you want to enter Ophiuchus where Pios is,{C=0xFF016295/}Ring of Star Sign{C=0xFF4D0D08/} is needed.
Then, please take a note for Star Sign's order you should go. You need to visit each sign in order.

This item can be created using key items from each Star Sign.
Among the 5 keys required, the very first key is Key of Moonlight and it's from Taurus which opens on Monday. {C=0xFF016295/}Key of Flame Star{C=0xFF4D0D08/} is Cancer on Tuesday.%% Key of Blue Star is Virgo on Wednesday. Key of Green Star is Scorpio on Thursday. Key of Golden Star is from Hydra on Friday.
If you don't listen my instruction, you cannot enter Ophiuchus. Please think about it again.
Listen to Crete's instruction.
Get Golden Fleece
There is beautiful lady called {C=0xFF00863C/}Europe{C=0xFF4D0D08/} in Taurus which opens on Monday
Great. You got Golden Fleece. Now you can to inside of Taurus.

{C=0xFF00863C/}Europe{C=0xFF4D0D08/} and I are friends, so if you ask {C=0xFF016295/}Key of Moonlight{C=0xFF4D0D08/} to her, she would give it to you.%% However, {C=0xFF00863C/}Europe{C=0xFF4D0D08/} made Seal to protect herself from God of Hell, Hades, because he keeps bugging her. To enter inside of Seal, you need {C=0xFF00863C/}Golden Fleece {C=0xFF4D0D08/}.%% Golden Sheep will be Aries on Monday, please obtain {C=0xFF00863C/}Golden Fleece C=0xFF4D0D08/} from the Sheep.
cough, cough.. I have incurable disease. I have no time.
I assume .. That you haven't obtained {C=0xFF00863C/}Golden Fleece{C=0xFF4D0D08/}, yet.
Golden Fleece
Clear Aries dungeon
Key of Moonlight
Literally, there are so many Taurus in Taurus dungeon.
You got the first key. I really appreciate it.

{C=0xFF00863C/}Europe{C=0xFF4D0D08/} likes {C=0xFFFF0000/}The bull Minotauros{C=0xFF4D0D08/}the most.%% As I already told you, {C=0xFF00863C/}Europe{C=0xFF4D0D08/} has unstable stat of mind, so you need extra care when you approach her to ask something. If there's any threat to {C=0xFF00863C/}Europe{C=0xFF4D0D08/}, {C=0xFFFF0000/}The bull Minotauros{C=0xFF4D0D08/} which protects {C=0xFF00863C/}Europe{C=0xFF4D0D08/} will start to attack you no matter what you say.
{C=0xFF00863C/}%name%{C=0xFF4D0D08/}, please.
Key of Moonlight
Clear Taurus dungeon
Strong Sisters
Now you can go get {C=0xFF016295/}Key of Flame Star{C=0xFF4D0D08/}.

I don't think you can get the key easily because dark nebula is surrounded Cancer right now. Also it's first time for {C=0xFF00863C/}%name%{C=0xFF4D0D08/} to get there.%% However, Patrol of Star Sign {C=0xFF00863C/}Twin Sisters{C=0xFF4D0D08/}, {C=0xFF00863C/}Pollux and Castor{C=0xFF4D0D08/} know the place very well.. You should ask their help.
.. I have nothing to say.
Ah, Pios, I pray that you're safe.
Leading compass
Clear Gemini dungeon
Recover Twin sisters
Key of Flame Star
If you have Leading compass, you don't have problem to enter Cancer.

{C=0xFFFF0000/}Monster Crab Kyrab{C=0xFF4D0D08/}has the second key, which is called {C=0xFF016295/}Key of Flame Star{C=0xFF4D0D08/}.%% However, that Monster Crab is really big and it's armed with a sharp single pair of claws. It doesn't show up often, but once it gets upset with something, it destroys everything around it.
{C=0xFF00863C/}%name%{C=0xFF4D0D08/}, please.
Key of Flame Star
Clear Cancer Dungeon
Symbol of Purity, Unicorn's Horn
The third key is called Key of Blue Star, which can be obtainable from Virgo on Wednesday.
If you have {C=0xFF016295/}Unicorn's Horn{C=0xFF4D0D08/}, you have no problem to enter Virgo.

I heard that {C=0xFF00863C/}Goddess of Spring Persephone{C=0xFF4D0D08/} holds Key of Blue Star. However, recently Persephone is really concerned with {C=0xFF7D0000/}God of Hell Hades{C=0xFF4D0D08/}.%% Hades is kind of playboy. he's not only flirt with {C=0xFF00863C/}Europe{C=0xFF4D0D08/}, but also {C=0xFF00863C/}Goddess of Spring Persephone{C=0xFF4D0D08/}. ( I'm really lucky that I have my fiancé.. )%% So, Persephone's mother, Goddess of earth Demeter made strong seal to protect her from Hades. That's why you need symbol of purity {C=0xFF016295/}Unicorn's Horn{C=0xFF4D0D08/} to approach her. That horn is kept by {C=0xFFFF0000/}Monster Lion Caelum{C=0xFF4D0D08/}.%% First, you should go to Leo and get {C=0xFF016295/}Unicorn's Horn{C=0xFF4D0D08/}. Then you can go to Virgo.
{C=0xFF00863C/}%name%{C=0xFF4D0D08/}, are you scared of this challenge?
Star Sign is being eroded by Chaos at this moment.
Unicorn's Horn
Clear Leo Dungeon
Key of Blue Star
You can obtain the third Key which called Key of Blue Star, from Persephone in Virgo.
Hades tried kidnapping again?? It's really scary..

As I already told you, Persephone is really afraid that Hades try to see her again. I think the Seal seems to be weaker than usual due to Chaos erosion. I'm concerned with Hades to come to Persephone's place to kidnap her again.%% So please go to Persephone's place and explain the situation to her. And be careful of Hades and his subordinates.
Persephone is beautiful lady.. You're going to regret if you don't help her.
I hope you can see Persephone soon.
Key of Blue Star
Clear Virgo Dungeon
Flying Horse Pegasus
The forth key can be obtainable from Scorpio which is opened on Thursday.
Since {C=0xFF016295/}Feather of Pegasus{C=0xFF4D0D08/} can make your body really light, you can fly over the sky to avoid Poison.
{C=0xFF00863C/}%name%{C=0xFF4D0D08/}.. You looks so tired.
Feather of Pegasus
Clear Pegasus Dungeon
Key of Green Star
Monster Scorpion Kingspion from Scorpio owns the forth key called Key of Green Star.
You finally got the forth key. We only have 1 key left.

If you have {C=0xFF016295/}Feather of Pegasus{C=0xFF4D0D08/}, you can avoid poison and enter since it can make your body really light.%% However, you should be careful the passage to go Monster Scorpion, there are so many poisonous bugs.
Are you scared of Scorpion?
{C=0xFF00863C/}%name%{C=0xFF4D0D08/}, be careful with Poisonous bugs.
Key of Green Star
Clear Scorpio Dungeon
Wise Kentarous
The last key, which called Key of Golden Star is owned by Hydra with many heads.
I can see Pios soon, I really appreciate it, {C=0xFF00863C/}%name%{C=0xFF4D0D08/}.

Sea Snake Hydra is sealed because it's too violent. But it seems we need to wake up the monster.%% To wake up Hydra,{C=0xFF016295/}Goddess' Harp{C=0xFF4D0D08/} is required. {C=0xFF016295/}Goddess' Harp{C=0xFF4D0D08/} is owned by Kentarous tribe's Kailon, who is well known by his knowledge and brightness.%% If you explain the situation to him, you can get {C=0xFF016295/}Goddess' Harp{C=0xFF4D0D08/}.
This is the last thing to do to see Pios, come on,{C=0xFF00863C/}%name%{C=0xFF4D0D08/}.
Kailon is well known by his knowledge and brightness. He's also good at music and medicine.
Goddess' Harp
Clear Sagittarius Dungeon
Key of Golden Star
Sea Snake Hydra has many heads.
You defeated vicious Hydra. Now you have 5 keys, and we can make {C=0xFF016295/}Ring of Star Sign{C=0xFF4D0D08/} using 5 keys, and go to Ophiuchus.

Hydra's head can be recovered repeatedly. That's why it's not easy to kill it.%% I don't want to wake it up, but there's no choice. To protect Star Sign world from Chaos, We need to do this. So, {C=0xFF00863C/}%name%{C=0xFF4D0D08/}, you need to make it fall in sleep after you get Key of Golden Star.
You really scared of Hydra.
This is the last key. Come on.
Key of Golden Star
Clear Hydra Dungeon
Key to Aries
Did you decide to Aries Dungeon?
I'll explain rest of this later, take this. Here you go.
I'll give you Bracelet of Brother and Sister once in a week, but only on Monday. This item is necessary to enter Aries Dungeon. I can give you only one, because it's also hard for me to get.
If you have enough Bracelets, please say so. You need to remember this, you can get this item from me only on Monday.
Talk to Crete
Talk to Crete
Key to go Pegasus
{C=0xFF00863C/}%name%{C=0xFF4D0D08/}. You did really good job.
Pegasus is mysterious creature, and it's not familiar with people. So, to be close to Pergasus, it's necessary to have this item. No you can enter Pegasus.
Every Thursday, I'll give you Essence of an unicorn. To enter Pegasus Dungeon, it's necessary to have it.
I can give you Essence of an unicorn on Thursday only. Please think about it again.
Talk to Crete
Key to Leo
{C=0xFF00863C/}%name%{C=0xFF4D0D08/}, you did good job.
This is called Badge of Battle Team. I heard that this Badge used to be given to people who has power to fight with Lions. You can enter Leo Dungeon when you have this item.
Every Wednesday, I'll give you Badge of Battle Team. This is necessary to have it when you enter Leo Dungeon.
To enter Leo Dungeon, you need to have Badge of Battle Team.
Talk to Crete
Key to go Gemini
You came back from Aries Dungeon.
Please take this Necklet of friendship. I gave you enough Necklets. I'll always pray for your safety.
Every Tuesday, I'll give you Necklet of friendship. It's necessary to have it when you enter Gemini Dungeon.
There are only few Necklet of friendship left. And, I cannot give it to you but only on Tuesday.
Talk to Crete
Key to go Sagittarius
You want to go back to Sagittarius?
Please becareful! And please do not exchange it with a sweet. I will keep my eyes on you!
You need to visit Kailon? I hope everything is ok. Please take this Trophy of Victory. You can use it to enter Sagittarius.
You don't need to visit Sagittarius? That is good to hear.
How can I help you?
Eek! Now what?!
These must be henchmen sent by Hades. My dear Minotaur, protect me from these wretches.
No..no.. Crete.. We are not Hades' henchmen..
Hah! Do you expect me to fall for your trickery? Do you take me for a fool? Minotaur! Go and crush them!
But..but..we're telling the truth.. Whoa. Better get to safety first.
Eek! Now what?!
These must be henchmen sent by Hades. My dear Minotaur, protect me from these wretches.
Europa. We have met before. Don't you remember?
Hah! Do you expect me to fall for your trickery? Do you take me for a fool? Minotaur! Go and crush them!
As forgetful as she is impatient.
Ah.. Are you all right Minotaur?
We came here on behalf of Crete. We need the Moonlight Star Keys in order to help bring back Pheos from his situation.
Crete, you say? Why didn't you tell me in the first place? I just assumed you were sent by that pervert, Hades…
!!(But I explained it already…)
Here is the key, now go help Crete. Should you meet Hades on the way, make sure you teach him a lesson so he never comes near me again.
Ah.. Are you all right Minotaur?
Europa, we are the ones you gave the Moonlight Star Keys to…
What? Back when… Oh that's right. It must've slipped my mind. Why didn't you say so in the first place??
!!!(Phew…What's the point.)
Ugh… Little sister. Why is this happening to us? You were good until now.
Oh… Little sister%% When will this chaos stop????
Who are you people? I don't recognize any of you.
We are here to retrieve the Flame Star Key. We heard it can be obtained by defeating the monster Kyrab.
Well, this is definitely good news. I was about to hunt a monster crab for dinner myself. You can just stand back and enjoy the show.
Hey ugly! Are you ready to become my dinner?

(This one is tougher than I expected…but I can't lose face in front of them.) Whoa.. This one is putting up quite a fight! But, no need to help. Just stay back and keep watching. (…I wish they would help out just a little...)
Hey ugly! Are you ready to become my dinner?
Is this the life of a hero? Fighting monster crabs day in and day out?
Hercules, we will help.
(Saved by the bell)

Thanks to you, that monster crab was no match for me. Say.. You are not from Starsign World, are you? Are you heros from a different world? ( This could be a great addition to the tales of my exploits. Hercules saves other-wordly heroes from the deadly Kyrab )
We are on a Dragonica expedition in search for Pheos of Ophiuchus. You are the hero Hercules from the mythology! (Not as strong as it says…)
Ha ha ha!!! So, you know me. (My reputation precedes me).
Did you happen to say, Pheos? I heard many rumors about him recently. So, there really is a problem.
We came here on behalf of Crete. To help bring back Pheos from his situation.
Ha ha ha! Not even a bit-size morsel. (My back..! I'm getting too old for this.)
Thanks to, Hercules, we have obtained the Flame Star Key.
Unbelievable. We have defeated the giant lion…%% You are not from the Starsign world. Are you guys hero from a different world?
Help! Anybody! Please save me from these horrible monsters.
Thanks, you saved my life. You don't seem to be from the Starsign World. Where do you come from?
Persephone. We have come from the world of Dragonica to cure Pheos of Ophiuchus. We require the Blue Star Key to get there.
If it is the Blue Star Key you seek, I have it. You may take it with you if you wish.
Ever since Pheos started to act strange, Hades and his henchmen have been pestering me more and more. Please, cure Pheos with whatever it takes!
Once again, you have helped us. Thank you.
Hello.. What is going on?%% We require some help from Pegasus… Is there anything we can do to help you?
Sign~~~~ Actually it was not a snake bite that caused her pain, it was food poisoning.%% Andromeda is not a good cook, but I did not expect it to be this bad. Got poisoned by her own food…
I can treat my wife with this poisonous sting. Say..You said you need the Green Star Key, right? Here it is. I hope you find Pheos and help him.
Oh, I will never forget what you have done for me. With your aid, Pegasus is safe and I have obtained the scorpion's poisonous sting.
It is good to see you again. Thanks to you I was able to use the poisonous sting to save my wife.
Whew…It turns out my wife had food poisoning. I always knew her cooking was bad, but I never expected that she would get poisoned by herself!
I love my wife, so I will continue to love her cooking no matter how bad it tastes.
But…just in case, I am collecting poisonous stings from scorpions as medicine for emergencies. It seems like I will have to collect them for the rest of my life. (Let's out a deep sigh)
Oh dear, I lost my mind again. I am ashamed of my position, which is the wise centaurs.
It should be around here somewhere…
I know it to be around here as well. Huh? The ground is shaking!
Whew…defeated at last. It is great to have the hero Hercules by our side.
Not at all. It was all thanks to Perseus. Perseus is the true hero!
You are both true heroes. Now that we have the Gold Star Key, we can go to Ophiuchus.
Snap out of it, Pheos. Your fiancee, Crete, is awaiting your safe return.
What's this? Something is coming out of Pheos?!
You… How dare you make me deal with you myself !! Your lives are forfeit!!
So, you are the one corrupting Pheos. You will pay for this!!!
You… How dare you make me deal with you myself !! Your lives are forfeit!!
Be gone!! Pheos, wake up!!!
No!! This cannot be… No!!! You haven't heard the last of me yet!!
You're finally yourself again, Pheos. Why did you suddenly disappear like that? (Sob)
My beloved Crete. All I wanted was to cure your ailment.
While searching for herbs to treat you, a snake called Serpents presented itself. He told me about a certain healing art that can cure any illness and even bring people back from the dead.
So, I fell for his trickery.
Please forget me. If not, you will continue to fall prey to chaos and confusion.
I will never forget your love, Pheos. Even in the afterworld.
This isn't the end!!
I heard people's talking..
… Are you serious???
Second Key is {C=0xFF016295/}Key of Flame Star{C=0xFF4D0D08/} which can be obtained from Cancer. But…..
You got the second key. %name%, you are Great!
… Are you serious???

However, the passage to get the place is filled with poison and you cannot walk through it. If you have Flying Horse Pegasus, it would be possible to get there.%% I got to tell you, the horse is really valuable and there are so many people who wants to get it. Especially you should be careful with Hades… {C=0xFF7D0000/}God of Hell Hades{C=0xFF4D0D08/} didn't give up on Pegasus and ordered his subordinates to get it for him. If you see the horse in danger, please make sure it is not caught by others.
I wonder when there's true peace… I'll count on {C=0xFF00863C/}%name%{C=0xFF4D0D08/} and just wait for you.
Protector of Stars
The Ophiuchus has been corrupted.
Peace will now return to the land.

The Serpents are trying to corrupt Ophiuchus. In order to bring disorder to constellation, Pheos has gone to stop him. But I'm afraid he is no match for him so please go aid him in his efforts, %name%.
A threat to Starsign is a threat to the kingdom.
We don't have much time!
Restoration of Ophiuchus.
Persistent Serpents.
They say the Serpents are after Pheos.
The Serpents will no longer dare to come near Pheos.
It seems like the Serpents are looking for a chance to tempt Pheos. Go to Ophichius and defeat the Serpents, %name%.
Are you afraid of the Serpents?
Please save Pheos.
Serpents defeated.
Crete's lover - Pheos.
Pheos has gone to Ophiuchus to retrieve his research.
Thank you for finding Pheos.
Pheos has left to retrieve his research, but has not returned. Travel to Ophiuchus to find him.
I'm worried about Pheos.
You have not left for Ophiuchus yet?
Pheos' recovery
Restoration of Ophiuchus.
Something must have happened in the Starsign
Thanks to you, %name%, the Starsign will soon recover.
The Serpents must be hatching a scheme in Ophiuchus. The Starsigns are starting to become misaligned.
I am worried about Pheos.
You have not left for Ophiuchus yet?
Restoration of Ophiuchus.
The source of corruption
The Serpents have reemerged in Ophiuchus.
Is he gone for good?
Rumors say the Serpents appeared right after Pheos' disappearance. But I am afraid the Serpents may have tempted Pheos once more.
I am worried about Pheos.
You have not left for Ophiuchus yet?
Serpents defeated.
The disapperance of Pheos
Pheos has gone back to Ophiuchus.
Thank you for finding Pheos.
He left to Ophiuchus a few days ago and no one has heard anything about him since then. %name%, please go to Ophiuchus and look for Pheos.
I am worried about Pheos.
You have not left for Ophiuchus yet?
Pheos' recovery
Help Friends
Could it be the three heads that gives it strength?
It's good to see you have strong companions.
%name%, you can't face the three heads alone. Gather allies to strike down the hydra.
You seem afraid.
You do know where Hydra is, right?
Hydra defeated.
The sea serpent's identity
Even a monster has its weaknesses.
It truly did have a weakness.
It may have three heads, but killing one should suffice.
You seem afraid.
You do know where Hydra is, right?
Hydra defeated.
One? Two? Three?!
It appears that the travelers are mortified due to Hydra’s appearance.
Amazing that it has three heads.
They say it has one? two? Or perhaps three heads. The people are afraid.
You seem afraid.
You do know where Hydra is, right?
Hydra defeated.
Wretched Perseus
For lovely wife
This should suffice for now.
Perseus' wife must be a dreadful cook. He said he needed to obtain an antidote for it and has gone to Scorpio alone.
Please help Perseus.
There is no time to waste, please go help him now.
King Scorpion defeated.
Scorpion poison
King Scorpion's poison can also act as an antidote.
Thanks to you, %name%, I now have the antidote.
Perseus' wife has fallen ill. Ironic that the only cure is King Scorpion's poison. Please help Perseus obtain the antidote.
Perseus' wife is gravely ill.
There is no time to waste, please go help him now.
King Scorpion defeated.
Destroyer of Scorpio
Many people who travel through Scorpio have fallen ill.
The poisonous mist is slowly lifting.
King Scorpion has reappeared and been releasing a venomous mist that is poisoning the travelers.
Many travelers are falling ill even as we speak.
There is no time to waste. Please be on your way.
King Scorpion defeated.
It is a pain to be beautiful
We received word that Persephone has been taken again.
No rest for the beautiful.
Hades has come back to harass Persephone. Make sure Hades does not trouble her ever again.
You will regret this. Persephone is a real beauty.
I am worried about Persephone.
Rescue Persephone
Hades the skirt chaser
Hades the skirt chaser has appeared again.
Hades will no longer trouble us, right?
They say Hades has kidnapped Persephone. Poor Persephone. Please travel to Virgo and rescue her.
You will regret this. Persephone is a real beauty.
I am worried about Persephone.
Rescue Persephone
The chaos of Virgo
We have lost contact with Persephone.
Thank you for rescuing Persephone.
It has been some time since Persephone sent us an urgent message. Something must have happened. Please travel to Virgo and find out.
You will regret this. Persephone is a real beauty.
I am worried about Persephone.
Rescue Persephone
Today we dine on crab
Hercules has gone to face Kyrab alone.
Tonight, we will dine to our heart's content.
Hercules has traveled again to Cancer. Perhaps he had a hankering for some crab. %name%, could you follow him to Cancer? It is too dangerous for him to go alone.
Are you afraid of the Kyrab?
Cancer is to the back.
Minotaur defeated.
Can we eat it?
Can we eat the Kyrab monster?
How can you eat such a large thing?
Hercules often travels to Cancer to bring back Kyrabs for dinner, but today he has not been heard. Travel to Cancer and aid him.
Are you afraid of the Kyrab?
Cancer is to the back.
Kyrab defeated.
Kyrab appeared.
Kyrab, the monster crab, has reappeared.
Hmm. Is this the same Kyrab from before?
They say Kyrab has returned. I am certain you have defeated it. %name%, could you travel to Cancer and defeat it once more?
Are you afraid of the Kyrab?
Cancer is to the back.
Kyrab defeated.
Hear me out.
Europa is so forgetful.
Now, Europa will come to her senses.
Even though I have tried to reason with Europa, she keeps forgetting who I am. You will just have to teach Europa and Minotaur a lesson, %name%.
Starsign may be in grave danger.
Please go before Minotaur becomes more violent.
Minotaur defeated.
Calm down, friend.
I wonder what Europa is doing.
How long will this peace last?
Minotaur is on a rampage, but Europa has no intention of putting an end to it. Please, put an end to Minotaur's violence, %name&%
Starsign may be in grave danger.
Please go before Minotaur becomes more violent.
Minotaur defeated.
Wild bull.
They say Minotaur is on a rampage.
Thanks to you, %name%,
Taurus is becoming unstable due to Minotaur's rampage. Please go to Taurus and put an end to his antics.
Starsign may be in grave danger.
Please go before Minotaur becomes more violent.
Minotaur defeated.
Starsign Guardian Cloak
Are you ready?
Look! The power of the Starsigns is flowing through the cloak.
Hand me the Concentrated Black Dragon Lord's Heart and Ophiuchus Star Fragment. It will take absolute concentration to tune the power of the two.
Return to me anytime and I will reward you.
Did you bring the Concentrated Black Dragon Lord's Heart?
Concentrated Black Dragon Lord's Heart (Wing)
Ophiuchus Star Fragment
Concentrated Black Dragon Lord's Heart
In order to obtain the Concentrated Black Dragon Lord's Heart, you will need Black Dragon Lord's equipment.
Phew… the magic of the Black Dragon Lord has been stored safely.
Bring me the Black Dragon Lord's wing. I will extrac the essence from it for you.
Return to me anytime and I will reward you.
Where is the Black Dragon Lord's wing?
Black Dragon Lord's wing

Phew… the magic of the Black Dragon Lord has been stored safely.
Give me the Black Dragon Lord's Shoes. I will give you back the magic of the Black Dragon Lord.
Return to me anytime and I will reward you.
Show me your swiftness.

Return to me anytime and I will reward you.

They say the Black Dragon Lord's Shoulderguard is the symbol of self-sacrifice.
Phew… the magic of the Black Dragon Lord has been stored safely.

Return to me anytime and I will reward you.

Return to me anytime and I will reward you.

They say the Black Dragon Lord's Top is the symbol of valor.
Phew… the magic of the Black Dragon Lord has been stored safely.
Give me the Black Dragon Lord's Top I will give you back the magic of the Black Dragon Lord.
Return to me anytime and I will reward you.

[Hero]Top of Black Dragon Lord
Protector of Stars (Helmet)
They say the Black Dragon Lord's Helm is the symbol of wisdom.
Phew… the magic of the Black Dragon Lord has been stored safely.
Please give me a moment. I need to fully concentrate, for this is my first time actually doing this myself.
Return to me anytime and I will reward you.
Show me your wisdom.
[Hero]Helm of Black Dragon Lord
Protector of Stars (Weapon)
They say the Black Dragon Lord's Weapon is the symbol of courage.
Phew… the magic of the Black Dragon Lord has been stored safely.
I have heard the Black Dragon Lord's weapon contains the most powerful magic. This might take some time.
Return to me anytime and I will reward you.
Show me your courage.
[Hero]Weapon of Black Dragon Lord
The dungeon of Ophiuchus cleared
Peaceful Port of Winds

How strange. It was not long ago the kingdom faced a financial crisis because people could not pay their tax. Recently, the merchants have paid off their overdue taxes and Port of Winds is bustling with activity.
It is good that with the restoration of the climate everything has returned to normal.

I am curious as to why the wind of prosperity is blowing again through Port of Winds. It would seem people are flocking in, attracted by the goods of the highest quality produced by the merchants. Go speak with the merchants and find out the reason why.
All that I am asking is for you to speak with the people in town. Is that too much to ask?
Is that all? They did not speak of other matters?
I am not sure why, but high quality ingredients are pouring in at low prices. In return, we can make copious amounts of great food and offer them at low prices as well.
Since I can make them with the best ores, people are buying up my superb wares. Thanks to the increased sales, I have been able to pay off my overdue taxes.
Grand Wizard Gwen's astrology readings have been spot on. We are mining lots of high quality ores and enjoying a rich harvest.
Now that the Starsigns have been realigned, astrological readings are correct once again. That puts my mind at ease.
The Starsigns have been realigned. The crop and livestock are growing well.
Talk to <Brutus> the Chef
Talk to <Davi> the Blacksmith
Talk to <Meister> the Production Master
Talk to <Gwen> the Grand Wizard
Talk to <Jeremy> the Great Sage
The unified key
Thanks to your efforts, all 5 keys have been collected. However, you cannot enter Ophiuchus with those 5 keys.
You have completed the Starsign Ring. You may not proceed to Ophiuchus.
If you combine the 5 keys, you can create the Starsign ring. Only this ring will let you pass into Ophiuchus. Forge the 5 keys together and bring me the Starsign Ring.
If you do not combine the 5 keys, you cannot enter Ophiuchus.
Where is the Starsign Ring?
Starsign Ring
Protector of Stars
Thanks to you, %name%, Pheos has recovered and the stars have realigned. Please take this as my show of gratitude.
If you bring me the proof that you have defeated the Black Dragon Lord, I will extract the magic and purify it.

In order to forge Protector of Stars equipment, we need strong magic. Only the strongest magic can withstand the power of the Starsigns. Therefore, using the Black Dragon Lord's magic might be the only way.
Return to me anytime and I will reward you.
Conversation with Crete
In search of Pheos
Thanks to your efforts, all 5 keys have been collected. You may now enter Ophiuchus.
Thanks to you Pheos has recovered, and the Starsigns are realigning themselves, %name%. Much gratitude.
Use the Starsign Ring and enter Ophiuchus, %name%. Pheos is there. Please save Pheos, you are the only one who can.
Is there no one who can stop the spread of chaos?
You are the only one who can save Pheos and restore order.
Pheos' recovery
I am not sure why, but high quality ingredients are pouring in at low prices. In return, we can make plenty of great food and offer them at low prices as well.
Since I can make them with the best ores, people are buying up my superb wares. Thanks to the increased sales, I have been able to pay off my overdue taxes.
Grand Wizard Gwen's astrology readings have been spot on. We are mining lots of high quality ores and enjoying a rich harvest.
Now that the Starsigns have been realigned, astrological readings are correct once again. That puts my mind at ease.
The Starsigns have been realigned. The crop and livestock are growing well.
Talk to <Davi> the Blacksmith
Talk to <Meister> the Production Master
Talk to <Gwen> the Grand Wizard
Talk to <Jeremy> the Great Sage
We can't let you fight alone. Here we go!!
I see. If you need my help, come visit me anytime. I will gladly help as I owe Pheos a debt too.
